feature1.explanation: Both texts use commas for listing items and as part of the sentence structure.

overall.explanation: Overall, considering the consistency in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
